channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for KS

item.title: Report X-2023111003
item.description:
Report X-2023111003

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-07T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-11
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: A BOX WITH SHIPPING PAPERS AND A FLAMMABLE LIQUID DIAMOND HAZARD LABEL WAS FOUND LEAKING AT AN OUTBOUND TRAILER DOOR. A DESIGNATED RESPONDER PLACED THE LEAKING PACKAGE IN A LINED SPILL TUB AND TRANSPORTED IT TO THE DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED UP TO AUDIT A PACKAGE THAT HAD HAZARDOUS LABELS, RESPONDER NOTICED IT HAD LEAKED A FEW DROPS OF PAINT. FROM THEN RESPONDER STARTED DMP PROCEDURES.

item.title: Report X-2023110315
item.description:
Report X-2023110315

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-05T18:13:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-02
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: A BOX WITH SHIPPING PAPERS AND A HAZARDOUS FLAMMABLE LIQUID DIAMOND LABEL WAS LEAKING ON AN OUT BOUND BELT ON PD 5. A DESIGNATED RESPONDER OPENED THE BOX AND FOUND THAT IT HAD A LOOSE CAP. THE BOX AND ALL RELATED MATERIAL WAS PLACED IN A LINED SPILL TUB AND TRANSPORTED TO THE DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.

item.title: Report X-2023110617
item.description:
Report X-2023110617

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-07T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-29
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA NOTICED THE PACKAGE ON THE BELT INSIDE A TOTE AND PULLED IT OFF. THEY SAW IT WAS WET AND PLACED ON THE PALLETS. UPON INVESTIGATING THE PACKAGE, I NOTICED THE CONTENTS INSIDE WERE AEROSOL CANS WITHOUT A LABEL ON THE OUTSIDE. THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A TOTE WITH A LINED HAZMAT BAG. DescribePack: THE CAPS TO THE AEROSOL CANS BROKE OFF FROM THE PACKAGE BEING DROPPED. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A TOTE WITH A LINED HAZMAT BAG.

item.title: Report X-2023110272
item.description:
Report X-2023110272

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-05T18:13:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-31
  • City: WICHITA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-2023110272-SPLITTER NOTICED LEAKING PACKAGE AND CALLED RESPONDER. RESPONDER DISCOVERED LEAKING PACKAGE WITH CORROSIVE 8 DIAMOND LABEL. CARDBOARD BOX WITH TWO WET CORNERS. NO INTERIOR PACKAGING. TWO PLASTIC BOTTLES WITH LIQUID COMING OUT OF CLOSURE. X-2023110273-LOADER NOTICED LEAKING PACKAGE AND CALLED RESPONDER. RESPONDER DISCOVERED LEAKING CORRUGATED PACKAGE WITH CORROSIVE 8 LABELING LEAKING A SMALL AMOUNT ONTO THE FLOOR OF THE PACKAGE CAR. BOX CONTAINED TWO PLASTIC BOTTLES EACH LEAKING FROM CLOSURE. RESPONDER NOTED NO INTERIOR PACKAGING.

item.title: Report X-2023110271
item.description:
Report X-2023110271

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-05T18:13:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-31
  • City: WICHITA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PICKOFF NOTICED LEAKING PACKAGE AND CALLED RESPONDER WHO DISCOVERED CORRUGATED BOX WITH CORROSIVE 8 UN3266 LABELING. A SMALL AMOUNT WAS LEAKING FROM SIDE OF BOX AND FROM THE LIDS OF BOTH BOTTLES. THERE WAS NO INTERIOR PACKAGING. RESPONDER PROCESSED THROUGH DMP.

item.title: Report X-2023110230
item.description:
Report X-2023110230

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-05T18:13:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-28
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: A BOX WAS FOUND IN AN OUTBOUND BELT AND THE BOX WAS LEAKING FROM THE BOTTOM CORNER. THE BOX HAD SHIPPING PAPERS AND A HAZARDOUS DIAMOND CORROSIVE LABEL. A DESIGNATED RESPONDER PLACED THE BOX IN A LINED SPILL TUB AND TRANSPORTED IT TO THE DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.

item.title: Report X-2023110229
item.description:
Report X-2023110229

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-05T18:13:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-28
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: A BOX WITH HAZARDOUS SHIPPING PAPERS AND A 1.4 EXPLOSIVE C 1 DIAMOND HAZARD LABEL HAD POWDER LEAKING FROM THE CORNER OF THE BOX. EMPLOYEE WAS AUDITING THE PACKAGE WHEN HE SAW THE POWDER. AND OUTSIDE RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO HANDLE THE DAMAGE. THE OUTSIDE RESPONDER PLACED THE BOX IN A PLASTIC DRUM TO BE DISPOSED OF THROUGH THE DMP.

item.title: Report X-2023110224
item.description:
Report X-2023110224

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-05T18:13:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-27
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: UNLOAD SUPERVISOR CALLED IN A LEAKING HAZMAT TO THE DMP. DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED AND CONSULTED THE DECISION TREE ON HOW TO RESPOND. FOLLOWING DECSION TREE GUIDLINES THE RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE SPILL AND BROUGHT IT BACK TO THE DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.

item.title: Report X-2023110223
item.description:
Report X-2023110223

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-05T18:13:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-27
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: UNLOAD SUPERVISOR CALLED IN A LEAKING HAZMAT TO THE DMP. DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED AT THE LEAKER AND FOLLOWED THE GUIDLINES IN THE DECSION TREE TO CLEAN UP THE LEAKER. RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE LEAKER AND BROUGHT IT BACK TO THE DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.
